metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3478 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
rssh 2.3.3 and earlier allows local users to bypass intended restricted shell access via crafted environment variables in the command line.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3478` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

rssh - 2.3.3-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rssh package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.3-5').
